text: minnal avarute kannukale ranciyetukkumarakunnu. at (minnal) avarkk veliccam nalkumpealellam avar a veliccattil natannu peakum. iruttakumpeal avar ninnu peakukayum ceyyum. allahu uddesiccirunnenkil avarute kelviyum kalcayum avan tire nasippiccukalayuka tanne ceyyumayirunnu. nis'sansayam allahu et karyattinum kalivullavananâ€Œ
